definitions.definition: Without feeling or desire to work ; deprived of sensation .
examples: The blow to his head rendered him senseless ; he didn’t awaken until he was in the ambulance.

definitions.definition: Lacking meaning or purpose ; without common sense .
examples: What a senseless waste of money.

definitions.definition: Without a discernible meaning or purpose, especially of a violent or evil act.
examples: The school shooting was a senseless act of violence.

definitions.definition: Without consideration , awareness or sound judgement
examples: He took senseless risks, not even aware of the danger he was in.

main_definition: Without feeling or desire to work ; deprived of sensation .
secondary_definitions: Lacking meaning or purpose ; without common sense .
Without a discernible meaning or purpose, especially of a violent or evil act.
Without consideration , awareness or sound judgement
